alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 6:26PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Colorado, including the following county, Southwest Elbert County. * WHEN...Until 930 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated, mainly along West Bijou Creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 621 PM MDT, Heavy rain occurred in northern El Paso County, and may result in minor flooding along West Bijou Creek as runoff flows northward through southwest Elbert County. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwest Elbert County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
